#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        unsigned long long n,m;
        scanf("%llu%llu",&n,&m);
        if(m<=n/2)
        cout<<n/2+m<<endl;
        else
        {
            cout<<m-n/2<<endl;
        }
    }
}
